sentences.en: Ability to communicate both positive and negative information in a constructive manner.
sentences.cn: 以一种积极的态度传达正面和负面信息的能力.

sentences.en: After their meeting, both men described the talks as frank, friendly and constructive.
sentences.cn: 会面之后，两位男士均形容此次会谈坦率、友好且富有建设性。

sentences.en: At least I'm doing something constructive.
sentences.cn: 至少，我是在做有益的事情。

sentences.en: Daydreaming, travel, or spiritual goals are constructive outlets too.
sentences.cn: 白日梦 、 旅行或精神目标对你都是有帮助的宣泄途径.

sentences.en: I can't figure out why they ridicule this constructive suggestion.
sentences.cn: 我弄不懂他们为什么嘲笑这一建设性建议.

sentences.en: I meant it as a bit of constructive advice, but he took it as a personal insult.
sentences.cn: 我的本意是提一点儿建设性的意见, 可他认为是对他个人的侮辱.

sentences.en: I'm not sorry you stuck to business. It's such a constructive career.
sentences.cn: 我 说 现在你做生意可也 不赖 ,这也是一种富有创造性的事业.

sentences.en: If there are any anomalies, the application should make a constructive decision on its own authority.
sentences.cn: 如果出现意外, 程序应该做出自己权威的建设性决定.

sentences.en: In the course of the discussion many constructive opinions were heard.
sentences.cn: 在讨论当中,听到了很多建设性的意见.

sentences.en: She believes these talks will be the start of a constructive and mean-ingful dialogue.
sentences.cn: 她认为这些谈话将是一次具有建设性的、有意义的对话的开端。

sentences.en: The Prime Minister has promised that Israel will play a constructive role.
sentences.cn: 首相承诺以色列将发挥积极的作用。

sentences.en: The woman claims she was the victim of constructive dismissal after being demoted.
sentences.cn: 这位女士称她被降职后被迫离职，属于推定解雇。

sentences.en: This situation is called constructive interference.
sentences.cn: 这种情形称作相长干涉.
我们欢迎任何有建设性的批评。
我们乐意接受有建设性的批评.

words.tran_cn: 构造函数；构造器；建造者

trans.tran_cn: 建设的，建设性的，积极的，有助益的，构造上的，[法]推定的
trans.tran_en: useful and helpful, or likely to produce good results
